de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.matching.rules

Class MatchingRule<RecordType extends Matchable,SchemaElementType extends Matchable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.winter.matching.rules.MatchingRule<RecordType,SchemaElementType>
  • Type Parameters:
    RecordType - the type of records that are matched with this rule
    SchemaElementType - the type of schema elements that are used in the schema of RecordType
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparator<RecordType,SchemaElementType>, RecordMapper<Correspondence<RecordType,SchemaElementType>,Correspondence<RecordType,SchemaElementType>>, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregableMatchingRule, FilteringMatchingRule

    public abstract class MatchingRule<RecordType extends Matchable,SchemaElementType extends Matchable>
extends Object
implements Comparator<RecordType,SchemaElementType>, RecordMapper<Correspondence<RecordType,SchemaElementType>,Correspondence<RecordType,SchemaElementType>>
    Super class for all matching rules.
    Author:
    Oliver Lehmberg (oli@dwslab.de)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addComparatorToLog

        protected void addComparatorToLog(Comparator<RecordType,SchemaElementType> comparator)
        Enhances the schema of the comparator logs (long/short) to collect results for each comparator.
        Parameters:
        comparator - The comparator for which the log`s schema shall be enhanced.

      • initializeDebugRecord

        protected Record initializeDebugRecord(RecordType record1,
                                       RecordType record2,
                                       int position)
        Initializes a new record for a debug result based on the input records and the position of the corresponding comparator.
        Parameters:
        record1 - Original data record
        record2 - Original data record
        position - Position of the corresponding comparator when called for a short debug log entry.
        Returns:
        New debug results record.

        Fills a debug result from the corresponding comparators log.
        Parameters:
        debug - Debug record
        comparator - Source comparator.
        position - Comparator's position

      • addDebugRecordShort

        protected void addDebugRecordShort(RecordType record1,
                                   RecordType record2,
                                   Comparator<RecordType,SchemaElementType> comparator,
                                   int position)
        Adds a new record to the short debug log for a candidate match (record1-record2) based on a comparator and its position.
        Parameters:
        record1 - Original record 1
        record2 - Original record 2
        comparator - Corresponding comparator
        position - Position of the corresponding comparator

        Parameters:

        record2 - Original Record2
        similarity - Similarity value

      • activateDebugReport

        public void activateDebugReport(String filePath,
                                int maxSize,
                                MatchingGoldStandard debugGoldstandard)
        Activates the collection of debug results
        Parameters:
        filePath - describes the filePath to the debug results log.
        maxSize - describes the maximum size of the debug results log.
        debugGoldstandard - can be used to annotate the debug results log with matching information from a goldstandard

      • activateDebugReport

        public void activateDebugReport(String filePath,
                                int maxSize)
        Activates the collection of debug results
        Parameters:
        filePath - describes the filePath to the debug results log.
        maxSize - describes the maximum size of the debug results log.

      • fillSimilarity

        protected void fillSimilarity(Record debug,
                              Double similarity)
        Fills the similarity value of a debug record. This debug record is added to the list of debug results if the list's length does not exceed the maximum number of result entries yet. Additionally, the filling status is measured in percentage to be more restricted when adding new entry over time.
        Parameters:
        debug - Debug record
        similarity - Similarity value

      • writeDebugMatchingResultsToFile

        public void writeDebugMatchingResultsToFile()
        Write data matching debug results to file if logging was enabled via setCollectDebugResults

      • addGoldstandardToDebugResults

        protected void addGoldstandardToDebugResults()
        Annotate debug results with goldStandard and write data matching debug results to file if logging was enabled via setCollectDebugResults
